==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|重|籐|弓}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=しげどうゆみ|重籐|tr1=shigedō|pos1=a [[black]]-[[lacquer]]ed [[archery]] [[bow]] wrapped in strips of [[rattan]]|弓|tr2=yumi|t2=bow}}. The ''yumi'' is [[redundant]], but is used to clarify the meaning, as ''shigedō'' is not a very common word in modern {{etyl|ja|-}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ɕiŋe̞do̞ː jɯᵝmi]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しげどう ゆみ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=しげどうゆみ|weaponry}} a [[black]]-[[lacquer]]ed [[archery]] [[bow]] wrapped in strips of [[rattan]]
